# Book Center E-Commerce Project

## Project Overview
Modern e-commerce website for a Book Center selling books, stationery, school bags, and educational products.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router and TypeScript
- PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- JWT-based admin authentication
- Zustand for cart state management

## Authentication
- No customer login required
- Admin-only authentication for dashboard access

## Database Schema
- Admin: Manage admin users
- Category: Product categories
- Product: Product catalog
- Order: Customer orders
- OrderItem: Order line items

## Key Features
- Product browsing and search
- Shopping cart (client-side)
- Guest checkout
- Admin dashboard for product/order management
- Image upload for products
- Responsive modern UI
